Module net.tangly.fsm
Package net.tangly.fsm.utilities

Record Class StateMachineLogger<O,S extends Enum<S>,E extends Enum<E>>

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
net.tangly.fsm.utilities.StateMachineLogger<O,S,E>
All Implemented Interfaces:
StateMachineEventHandler<O,S,E>
public record StateMachineLogger<O,S extends Enum<S>,E extends Enum<E>>(StateMachine<O,S extends Enum<S>,E extends Enum<E>> machine) extends Record implements StateMachineEventHandler<O,S,E>
The state machine logger documents all activities performed during the firing of events for a specific finite state machine instance. All logs have the following structure: machine_name[machine_oid] operation parameters
